turns.speaker: agent

turns.speaker: agent

*   **Monday:** Lentil Soup (Lentils, carrots, celery, onion, vegetable broth, spices) - Approx. $10
*   **Tuesday:** Pasta with Tomato Sauce and Ground Beef (Pasta, canned tomatoes, ground beef, garlic, onion, spices) - Approx. $15
*   **Wednesday:** Chicken and Rice (Chicken thighs, rice, frozen vegetables, spices) - Approx. $18
*   **Thursday:** Leftovers from Tuesday
*   **Friday:** Pizza (Pre-made pizza dough, pizza sauce, mozzarella cheese, any toppings on sale like mushrooms or peppers) - Approx. $15

turns.speaker: user

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: That's a great question! I use a combination of average market prices for common grocery items and publicly available data.
